chunk:
Dr. Bronner's All One Hemp Pure Castile Bar Soap, Green Tea

Brand: Dr. Bronner's

Category: Bar Soap

Ingredients: Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Aqua, fragrance, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Sea Salt, Citric Acid, Tocopherol
ric Acid, Tocopherol, Geraniol, Linalool, Citronellol, Limonene
